16 Uses for Elektron Digitakt

22 Apr 2019

I've noodled around with my Elektron Digitakt drum machine/sampler but haven't used it enough to get comfortable with the workflow. I came across this video awhile ago about different techniques (16 of them!) to use the Digitakt for synthesis and modulation. I think it will be a nice reference for exploring the breadth of Digitakt's features beyond its sampling capabilities.
